infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to provide location-based services.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to provide location-based services.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for check-ins.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select photos for check-ins.
